snippet.title: Horror Story: Hallowseed -  Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Horror Story: Hallowseed is a story-driven psychological horror game available via Steam Early Access.

Get the game now on Steam: http://bit.ly/Hallowseed_Steam

Horror Story: Hallowseed is a single-player story-driven psychological horror game that takes place in the fictional location, Hallowseed. A place forgotten by time, wrapped in a mysterious demonic terror! Three friends were camping in the woods, when an obscure event takes them away, causing two of them to disappear. Left alone in an unknown place, Michael seeks answers about what happened, while trying to find his friends.

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#HorrorGame
